name: rana-monorepo
description: RANA - Rapid AI Native Architecture monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:helpers && npm run build:prompts && npm run build:rag && npm run build:react && npm run build:cli
scripts.clean: npm run clean:core && npm run clean:helpers && npm run clean:prompts && npm run clean:rag && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:cli
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:helpers && npm run test:prompts && npm run test:rag && npm run test:react
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:core && npm run typecheck:helpers && npm run typecheck:prompts && npm run typecheck:rag && npm run typecheck:react && npm run typecheck:cli
scripts.link:packages: cd packages/core && npm link && cd ../helpers && npm link @rana/core && npm link && cd ../prompts && npm link @rana/core && npm link && cd ../rag && npm link @rana/core && npm link && cd ../react && npm link @rana/core && npm link
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm run publish:core && npm run publish:helpers && npm run publish:prompts && npm run publish:rag && npm run publish:react
